page.title: 19 My School
page.content: My shool has a big playground at the front and a large playing field at the back. It is built around an enclosed rectangular garden. Along the front corridor is the head- mistress's room and the secretary's office. There are cloakrooms at each end and a changing room for P.E. and Drama, which we do in the assembly hall opposite the front entrance. On the right hand corridor is the library and the staffroom and down the left hand corridor are the needlework and the cookery rooms. On the back corridor all the rooms are classrooms. There are stairs at the front leading to the top front corridor. My classroom is here and this is where the computers are kept. Next door is the art room, then a science laboratory and finally the french room.
